column5: I was woundering if anyone knows a autherized repair facility of  Minn-Kota trolling motors I am looking at buying a used one and want to ask a few questions about them and maybe have them look at it before I buy.I  live in Guelph
Aikmans in Missisauga is an authorized dealer. Hwy 10 and 5
Rocky's Tackle Repair in Orillia is also an authorized service depot.
